channel.title: love, poetry, praise on K.Q. Dreger
channel.description: Recent content in love, poetry, praise on K.Q. Dreger

item.title: Spoken word "Love"
item.description: Had an interesting reflection experience. I felt really inspired after watching some of Jeff Bethke’s videos. I took this inspiration, along with my Macbook, and went to the BnB cafe. I grabbed a drink, sat down and took some quiet time to clear my mind. What I ended up doing was writing my first “spoken word” poetry piece. I really liked how it turned out, so I got creative and even made a video for it.
